item.title: Anything you can do ...
item.description: For any of you that are aware of the newly updated Xamarin Web site, you may have seen the following: Objective-C was ahead of its time 30 years ago. C# is ahead of its time today. Anything you can do in Objective-C or Java, you can do in C# with Xamarinâ€”usually more succinctly and with fewer bugs. What is also true is that F# is way ahead of its time, and you can produce even more succinct code with even fewer bugs than C#!
